description: This file defines a React functional component called IssueTypeModal that displays Jira issue types and related issues within a modal dialog. It manages state for issue fetching, handles loading/error states, and renders issue details with dynamic icons and color coding based on issue status.

methods.name: IssueTypeModal
methods.description: React component that fetches and displays issues of a specific Jira issue type within a modal popup.

methods.name: fetchIssues
methods.description: Asynchronous function to retrieve issues of a certain type from Jira API.

methods.name: getStatusColor
methods.description: Returns CSS classes for background and text color based on issue status category.

methods.name: getStatusIcon
methods.description: Returns an appropriate icon component based on issue status category.

methods.name: formatDate
methods.description: Formats a date string into a localized date; returns 'Unknown' if parsing fails.

methods.name: getIssueUrl
methods.description: Constructs a URL to the Jira issue detail page based on credentials and issue key.
